name: Vampiric Mist (B)
resistance: acid, cold, lightning, necrotic, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Life Sense
traits.desc: The mist can sense the location of any creature within 60 feet of it, unless that creature's type is construct or undead.

traits.name: Forbiddance
traits.desc: The mist can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

traits.name: Misty Form
traits.desc: The mist can occupy another creature's space and vice versa. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can pass through it without squeezing. Each foot of movement in water costs it 2 extra feet, rather than 1 extra foot. The mist can't manipulate objects in any way that requires fingers or manual dexterity.

traits.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
traits.desc: The mist takes 10 radiant damage whenever it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, the mist has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.
